str2: For. A primary particle; properly, assigning a reason.
From an adverb form of hode; in this same spot, i.e. Here or hither.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 1st Person Plural
str2: To have, hold, possess. Including an alternate form scheo skheh'-o; a primary verb; to hold.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Accusative Feminine Singular
str2: To remain, abide, stay, wait; with acc: I wait for, await. A primary verb; to stay.
A city, the inhabitants of a city. Probably from the same as polemos, or perhaps from polus; a town.
But, except, however. Neuter plural of allos; properly, other things, i.e. contrariwise.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 1st Person Plural
str2: To seek after, desire, search for, make inquiries about. From epi and zeteo; to search for; intensively, to demand, to crave.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Accusative Feminine Singular
str2: A strengthened form of melo; to intend, i.e. Be about to be, do, or suffer something.
